home.title: Example TG MiniApp
home.description:
This is a simple repository that can be used as a starting point for your project.
The template is based on Vue.js and includes a UI library and an icon set. For convenience, the template uses an ORM client for PostgreSQL and MinIO as an S3-compatible data store, which can be further integrated with the database. Express.js is used to handle API endpoints, and AioGram (in Python) is used for interacting with the Telegram API.
home.hint: To check the API status, you can open the settings tab via the button on the dock or click the button.

login.title: Here is your authorization code!
login.hint: open this application in Telegram in {botname} and enter the code

need_auth.hint: Please open this application inside the Telegram Mini App.

404.hint: The page you are trying to access does not exist.

401.hint: The page you are trying to access requires authorization!
